attributes.additional_details:
The A422 between Bnabury and Brackley is in need of a by pass , and has had road traffic accidentts on a blind 45 degree corner going into and out of the village.
Accidents delay Public Transport ,and other services , and the corner slows the flow of traffic going into the village , which causee delay and leads to acidents

rejection.details: This is a matter for Northamptonshire County Council.
